short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily minimize your Timesheet / Time Tracking window to save screen space! (Not affiliated with or endorsed by FreshBooks.)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Need to visually track your time without forgetting about the timer, but tired of taking up so much space? This simple extension adds a minimize/maximize button to your timer window to quickly adjust the size. You'll never forget to start or stop your timer again!
